Link: {!OTC_SPA__c.Link} Approval Status: {!OTC_SPA__c.Approval_Status__c} Price Intelligence: {!OTC_SPA__c.Price_Intelligence__c} SKU Count: {!OTC_SPA__c.SKU_Count__c} Product: {!OTC_SPA__c.Product__c} Thanks,
